name: Restyleme
overview:
RestyleMe is a style advice website that allows people to rate other people’s styles.

RestyleMe has several unique features:

  • Pinpoint photo marking - In addition to being able to write comments, you can mark on users’ photos with a single click and give them feedback about their style with pinpoint accuracy. Don’t like that jacket? Click on it on the photo and let them know exactly how you feel.

  • Tagging of clothing items - You can tag style items or brands by selecting areas on your profile photo. Not only this allows you to show off your style, (combined with users’ ability of marking on photos) it also allows you to see how much people like that new shirt of yours.

  • Detailed bar graph results - You can view detailed stats about people’s opinion on your style shown with bar graphs. You can even filter your results based on age range, gender, and your home country. So you will know right away whether younger women like your new hair style for example.

  • We also feature social networking components like friend / favorite lists and user-friendly messaging.

The website is completely free and the registration is quick.
